hackathon-description-text: We are the tech societies from the University of Manchester and Manchester Metropolitan University, which organise student-oriented tech events all year round.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 4 x AGS Wireless Laser Projection Bluetooth Virtual Keyboard
4 x deAO X7 Mini 2.4GHZ 6 Axis Nano RC Climbing Aircraft Quadcopter
Team Netsol will award this prize to what they consider to be the best overall hack. This is separate from the overall hackathon prize.

How do we help a potential occupier understand size and available space options in a building without physically taking them there? This is a real challenge for today's property developers, agents and SME's. What does 6,000 sq ft look like to someone who isn't spatially aware?
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: NOMA Challenge: How big is that?

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Students face a number of issues, such as the rising costs of courses and living, stress at school and work, and many more. We would like the teams to pick one or more of these issues, and to come up an idea which can contribute to making the students's lives easier.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Barclays Challenge "Hack to half your worries"

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: We would like to challenge students to come up with an application to showcase start-ups to investors.
Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment. Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment. Win a HackHarassment Swag Bag.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Most viable startup idea. Prize: 4 x £30 amazon vouchers
Best use of Estimote beacons. Prize: 4 x estimote beacon kit.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How useful, inventive, funny or smart is the idea? Could it have significant impact?
How complex is the project? How inventive was the use of the technologies involved?
How complete is the project? How much did the attendees achieve in the 24 hours?

hackathon-location-description: Manchester Metropolitan University, John Dalton Building
